{{Description|Pearls, gems, and gold &mdash; such are the bounty of the mountains.<br>Their ancient, honored titles are the blessings of the past.<br>It is within the furnaces of the Children of Echoes that all these blessings are brought to fruition.<br>Yet when the hammer's inexorable blows are halted by hesitation, the echoes that ring out through the peaks also fall mute...<br>Can the Name Engraver, who has the watchful eye of the mountains, hear that which the ridges tell of?}}
'''A Prayer for Blessings, Told to Crested Peaks''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* After the Version 5.1 update – 2024/10/29 17:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 28 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter V]]: Act IV "[[The Rainbow Destined to Burn]]"
* Complete Act II "[[Hoarse Echoes]]" of "[[Tribal Chronicles]]: Children of Echoes"

===Summary===
* Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to unlock Act III of "Tribal Chronicles: Children of Echoes."
* Complete the Tribal Chronicles within the specified duration to obtain additional [[Primogem]]s, [[Character Ascension Material]]s, [[Character Level-Up Material]]s, [[Local Specialty (Natlan)|Natlan regional specialties]], and other rewards.
